dataset.title: Roccellinastrum, Cenozosia and Heterodermia: Ecology and phylogeny of fog lichens and their photobionts from the coastal Atacama Desert

abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jung, Patrick, Werner, Lina, Briegel-Williams, Laura, Emrich, Dina, Lakatos, Michael (2023): Roccellinastrum, Cenozosia and Heterodermia: Ecology and phylogeny of fog lichens and their photobionts from the coastal Atacama Desert. MycoKeys 98: 317-348, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.98.107764, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.98.107764

intellectualRights.para: To the extent possible under law, the publisher has waived all rights to these data and has dedicated them to the Public Domain (CC0 1.0). Users may copy, modify, distribute and use the work, including for commercial purposes, without restriction.

gbif.citation: Jung P, Werner L, Briegel-Williams L, Emrich D, Lakatos M, pensoft (2023). Roccellinastrum, Cenozosia and Heterodermia: Ecology and phylogeny of fog lichens and their photobionts from the coastal Atacama Desert. Plazi.org taxonomic treatments database. Checklist dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/5efucs accessed via GBIF.org on 2023-08-28.
